snippet.title: Dragonero Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Dragonero is a classic turn-based RPG with a strategic twist that will challenge you: explore dungeons, plan journeys in a open world filled with events.

Face dozens of enemies in turn-based combat, grow the heroes and craft powerful alchemy and technocracy items.
Follow the different champion's paths in this vast comic book-style fantasy universe.

Dragonero is out now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2532770/Dragonero/
